verses.verse: Now these are the divisions<WH4256> of the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175>. The sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175>; Nadab<WH5070>, and Abihu<WH30>, Eleazar<WH499>, and Ithamar<WH385>.
But Nadab<WH5070> and Abihu<WH30> died<WH4191> before<WH6440> their father<WH1>, and had no sons<WH1121>: therefore Eleazar<WH499> and Ithamar<WH385> executed the priest<WH3547>'s office.

And David<WH1732> distributed<WH2505> them<WH6659>, both Zadok of the sons<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499>, and Ahimelech<WH288> of the sons<WH1121> of Ithamar<WH385>, according to their offices<WH6486> in their service<WH5656>.

And there were more<WH7227> chief<WH7218> men<WH1397> found<WH4672> of the sons<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499> than of the sons<WH1121> of Ithamar<WH385>; and thus were they divided<WH2505>. Among the sons<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499> there were sixteen<WH8337> chief men<WH7218> of the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1>, and eight<WH8083> among the sons<WH1121> of Ithamar<WH385> according to the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1>.

Thus were they divided<WH2505> by lot<WH1486>, one sort<WH428> with another<WH428>; for the governors<WH8269> of the sanctuary<WH6944>, and governors<WH8269> of the house of God<WH430>, were of the sons<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499>, and of the sons<WH1121> of Ithamar<WH385>.

And Shemaiah<WH8098> the son<WH1121> of Nethaneel<WH5417> the scribe<WH5608>, one of the Levites<WH3881>, wrote<WH3789> them before<WH6440> the king<WH4428>, and the princes<WH8269>, and Zadok<WH6659> the priest<WH3548>, and Ahimelech<WH288> the son<WH1121> of Abiathar<WH54>, and before the chief<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> of the priests<WH3548> and Levites<WH3881>: one<WH259> principal<WH1> household<WH1004> being taken<WH270> for Eleazar<WH499>, and one taken<WH270> for Ithamar<WH385>.
Now the first<WH7223> lot<WH1486> came forth<WH3318> to Jehoiarib<WH3080>, the second<WH8145> to Jedaiah<WH3048>,
The third<WH7992> to Harim<WH2766>, the fourth<WH7243> to Seorim<WH8188>,
The fifth<WH2549> to Malchijah<WH4441>, the sixth<WH8345> to Mijamin<WH4326>,
The seventh<WH7637> to Hakkoz<WH6976>, the eighth<WH8066> to Abijah<WH29>,
The ninth<WH8671> to Jeshua<WH3442>, the tenth<WH6224> to Shecaniah<WH7935>,
The eleventh<WH6249> to Eliashib<WH475>, the twelfth<WH8147> to Jakim<WH3356>,
The thirteenth<WH7969> to Huppah<WH2647>, the fourteenth<WH702> to Jeshebeab<WH3428>,
The fifteenth<WH2568> to Bilgah<WH1083>, the sixteenth<WH8337> to Immer<WH564>,
The seventeenth<WH7651> to Hezir<WH2387>, the eighteenth<WH8083> to Aphses<WH6483>,
The nineteenth<WH8672> to Pethahiah<WH6611>, the twentieth<WH6242> to Jehezekel<WH3168>,
The one<WH259> and twentieth<WH6242> to Jachin<WH3199>, the two<WH8147> and twentieth<WH6242> to Gamul<WH1577>,
The three<WH7969> and twentieth<WH6242> to Delaiah<WH1806>, the four<WH702> and twentieth<WH6242> to Maaziah<WH4590>.

These were the orderings<WH6486> of them in their service<WH5656> to come<WH935> into the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068>, according to their manner<WH4941>, under<WH3027> Aaron<WH175> their father<WH1>, as the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> had commanded him<WH6680>.
And the rest<WH3498> of the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> were these<WH1121>: Of the sons of Amram<WH6019>; Shubael<WH7619>: of the sons<WH1121> of Shubael<WH7619>; Jehdeiah<WH3165>.
Concerning Rehabiah<WH7345>: of the sons<WH1121> of Rehabiah<WH7345>, the first<WH7218> was Isshiah<WH3449>.
Of the Izharites<WH3325>; Shelomoth<WH8013>: of the sons<WH1121> of Shelomoth<WH8013>; Jahath<WH3189>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Hebron<WH3404>; Jeriah the first<WH568>, Amariah the second<WH8145>, Jahaziel<WH3166> the third<WH7992>, Jekameam<WH3360> the fourth<WH7243>.
Of the sons<WH1121> of Uzziel<WH5816>; Michah<WH4318>: of the sons<WH1121> of Michah<WH4318>; Shamir<WH8053>.
The brother<WH251> of Michah<WH4318> was Isshiah<WH3449>: of the sons<WH1121> of Isshiah<WH3449>; Zechariah<WH2148>.
The sons<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> were Mahli<WH4249> and Mushi<WH4187>: the sons<WH1121> of Jaaziah<WH3269>; Beno<WH1121>.
The sons<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> by Jaaziah<WH3269>; Beno<WH1121>, and Shoham<WH7719>, and Zaccur<WH2139>, and Ibri<WH5681>.
Of Mahli<WH4249> came Eleazar<WH499>, who had no sons<WH1121>.
Concerning Kish<WH7027>: the son<WH1121> of Kish<WH7027> was Jerahmeel<WH3396>.
The sons<WH1121> also of Mushi<WH4187>; Mahli<WH4249>, and Eder<WH5740>, and Jerimoth<WH3406>. These were the sons<WH1121> of the Levites<WH3881> after the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1>.

These likewise cast<WH5307> lots<WH1486> over against<WH5980> their brothers<WH251> the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> in the presence<WH6440> of David<WH1732> the king<WH4428>, and Zadok<WH6659>, and Ahimelech<WH288>, and the chief<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> of the priests<WH3548> and Levites<WH3881>, even the principal<WH7218> fathers<WH1> over against<WH5980> their younger<WH6996> brothers<WH251>.
